description: Stand alone ice sheet model driven offline by ISMIP6 CMIP6 standard input for the PMIP4 Last Interglacial experiment, lig124k.
keywords: ISMIP6, Tier 3, last interglacial, stand-alone ISM, ice sheets only
long_name: offline ice sheet model forced by ISMIP6-specified AGCM last interglacial output
rationale: A period when sea level was higher than the present day by at least 4 meters.  To provide information on the tendency of the long term response of the current climate and ice sheet model.

requirements.description: Run for at least 100 years after spin-up, for use with paleoclimate experiments.
requirements.label: 100yrsAfterSpinUp

requirements.description: ISMIP6-specified input from the output of a PMIP4 Last Interglacial experiment, lig127k.
requirements.keywords: ISMIP6, ISMIP6-specified input, lig127k, last interglacial 127k
requirements.label: ISMIP6-specified lig127k input
